title: Minutes Network Unveils Plans To Onboard More Than 1 Billion Users By Q1 2026.
description: Kingstown, St Vincent and the Grenadines, February 19th, 2024, Chainwire Minutes Network, the worldâ€™s only blockchain based, distributed and decentralised voice carrier, has declared its plan to onboard over 1.2 billion users over the next two years. The key to this expansion plan is the proprietary Rapid Growth Library (MRGL) which enables rapid user scaling […]
